title: Kim's Herbs & Detox Center
cleaned_text: CHECK OUT OUR NEW "WELLNESS DETOX PACKAGES" OUR SERVICES Kim's Herbs & Detox Center offers all NATURAL herbs, vitamin/mineral supplements, homeopathic remedies, soaps, essential oils, specialty products, and much more... to enhance your health. We also offer various detox products and services! (select "SHOP" on our menu to Shop our products.)
